summary:
Content Updates

Page Title and Meta Description Update

The page title was changed to "Festival Season Schedule" and the description meta tag was updated to "A schedule of events for LessOnline, Summer Camp, and Manifest." This change possibly was made to better reflect the content and SEO adjustments.

Nav Menu Changes

1. The three main nav items have been updated to highlight the
page prominently by styling its link differently: previously all links appeared in gray, and now the

link appears in red to draw attention.

Event Schedule

Manifest Schedule

The schedule for the "Manifest" event was updated to include a detailed daily breakdown with specific times, locations, and maximum capacities. The venue details include images such as:

  • Rat Park
  • Eigen Hall
  • Bayes Ground
  • Bayes Attic

The update also includes a detailed description of each venue location and capacity, making it easier for attendees to plan their participation.

User Interaction Enhancements

Addition of three new buttons for views: Grid, Text, and RSVPâ€™d. These buttons offer users different ways to view the schedule, catering to varied preferences.

The "Manifest" schedule now shows detailed hour-by-hour breakdowns for the events happening on Friday, June 7, Saturday, June 8, and Sunday, June 9, including exact times and locations within the festival, promoting better engagement.
